page.title: 18SCHOOLS IN THE PAST
page.content: There have been two schools in { {Willand} before the third one was built in 1948.The first school was built in .The second school was built in 1853.In Willand school before this one,there were two classes and in each class there were about thirty children .Most pupils walked to school and if they were very lucky they cycled to school. Teachers mostly cycled to school or walked. They did not have a sports day of their own. They went to the village sports once a year where people came from miles around and joined in and watched.It was one of the biggest village sports in Devon. If they were late to school they had a black mark in the register.At school they could not have school dinner.They were not allowed to go home for their school dinner they mostly had meat and veg. Sometimes they had cottage pie.
